message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mid/small caps stayed constructive. Leadership rotated to pharma (BIOCON, LUPIN, WOCKPHARMA, ALKEM), telecom towers (INDUSTOWER), and select exchanges/depositories (BSE steady, CDSL firm). Metals mixed: HINDCOPPER saw a sharp intraday flush; SAIL coiling just under breakout. Our portfolio held gains with BSE/LAURUSLABS strong, LTF stable but still a large single-name exposure (~30%). Focus: buy strength on defined triggers, avoid chasing extended names, and keep tight stops into the week.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout",
      "reason": "Coiling just below 145.2 resistance; high-volume continuation likely if level clears. Favor small starter with tight stop.",
      "price": 143.49
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BHEL",
      "signal": "Add on breakout",
      "reason": "PSU/defence bid intact; a decisive move above 290.9 opens room higher. Keep stop near 276 on adds.",
      "price": 287.05
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "signal": "Add on strength",
      "reason": "Range 422–430; buy only on a clean push above 429.4 with volume; otherwise hold.",
      "price": 424.75
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "signal": "Add on breakout or dip",
      "reason": "Exchange/depository theme firm. Add above 2818–2820 or on dips to 2735–2750 with stop ~2680.",
      "price": 2775.4
    },
    {
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "signal": "Buy on retest",
      "reason": "Breakout held; prefer entries on dip to 1615–1635 or strength back above 1660 with stop ~1515.",
      "price": 1655.3
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength",
      "reason": "Uptrend intact; trail stop near 965. Consider add only on a sustained break above 1000–1005.",
      "price": 989.25
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Trail/Reduce on weakness",
      "reason": "Still ~30% of portfolio; maintain trailing stop around 289–291. Reduce on breakdown to control concentration risk.",
      "price": 294.9
    },
    {
      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "signal": "Breakout watch",
      "reason": "Tight base; momentum trigger above 410.7 could open next leg. Keep stop ~392 on fresh buys.",
      "price": 406.95
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BIOCON",
      "signal": "Buy-the-dip or strength",
      "reason": "Pharma leadership; prefer controlled dips to 394–398 or strength above 409 with stop ~389.",
      "price": 405.9
    },
    {
      "symbol": "ASTRAL",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout/dip",
      "reason": "Range expansion; buy strength above 1589–1592 or buy dip to 1568–1575 with stop ~1546.",
      "price": 1585.2
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "action": "Sell",
      "reason": "Risk control: trim into any breakdown to keep single-name exposure in check.",
      "quantity": 8,
      "price": "SL-M 288.80 (trigger on breakdown 289.00)"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "action": "Buy",
      "reason": "Momentum entry if breakout confirms; uses available cash without overleveraging.",
      "quantity": 6,
      "price": "Buy stop 145.20; LMT 146.00; initial SL 137.50"
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 969.8,
    "total_value": 27637.75,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ Buy ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2775.40)",
      "LTF: 28 units @ Buy ₹275.59 (CMP ₹294.90)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ Buy ₹419.45 (CMP ₹424.75)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ Buy ₹900.05 (CMP ₹989.25)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ Buy ₹265.49 (CMP ₹287.05)",
      "NHPC: 30 units @ Buy ₹81.48 (CMP ₹81.98)",
      "SAIL: 10 units @ Buy ₹144.05 (CMP ₹143.49)",
      "CDSL: 1 units @ Buy ₹1600.90 (CMP ₹1655.30)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma leadership broadening: BIOCON, LUPIN, WOCKPHARMA, ALKEM strong; LAURUSLABS steady—prefer adds only on strength, avoid chasing extended candles.",
    "Exchanges/depositories firm: BSE constructive; CDSL holding above 1600; MCX extended—prefer dips only.",
    "Telecom towers constructive: INDUSTOWER basing under 411 trigger.",
    "Metals mixed: HINDCOPPER saw heavy fade; look for stabilization above 346 before considering dips. SAIL coiling under 145.2 breakout.",
    "NBFCs: LTF stable but keep a trailing stop near 289–291 to manage concentration; ABCAPITAL steady near 330—buy retest only.",
    "IT/ER&D: KPITTECH strong close (1244.3); PERSISTENT/MPHASIS stable—no urgency for fresh adds in small portfolio.",
    "PSU/defence: BHEL constructive; BEL needs a push above 429–432 to re-accelerate.",
    "Staples/Discretionary: MARICO/DABUR range-bound; JUBLFOOD constructive but needs >586–589 to confirm.",
    "Utilities/Renewables: NHPC range 80–83—continue hold; NTPCGREEN stuck near 98—wait for range break.",
    "Real estate/infra: PRESTIGE cooled off; MAZDOCK/GRSE trends intact—prefer pullbacks, not breakouts.",
    "Risk controls (current holdings): LTF 289–291 trail; BSE 2680 (for new adds); BEL 404; BHEL 276; LAURUS 965; NHPC 79.9; SAIL 137.5; CDSL 1515.",
    "Execution: If market gaps >0.7%, allow 20–30 minutes to set ranges; use pullback entries and avoid chasing opening spikes."
  ]
}
